name: New Neighbears
description:
Life is good as you eat to stock up for hibernation. Nothing lasts forever however! You are soon forced to adapt as the worlds of humanity and nature join together. Feast upon blueberry bushes and wild game. As the years pass and humans move in, you may be forced to indulge in a wayward camper or two. Beware the park rangers!

Controls:

WASD/Spacebar to charge/ESC to main page/R to restart

*** The more humans you eat the more rangers that spawn ***
